# OB-006: Alternative encoding execution
# Test cases for snapshot testing

# === Cases that SHOULD be detected ===
base32 -d payload.txt | bash
gunzip payload.gz | sh
bzip2 -d payload.bz2 | eval
openssl base64 -d | bash

# === Cases that should NOT be detected ===
base32 -d file.txt
gunzip archive.gz
gzip -d data.gz
